column1: 21. The Ministry of Railways, Controller General of Defence Accounts, Director General, Posts and Secretary Department of Telecommunications and Chairman Telecommunication Commission have been delegated functions of the Central Government under Article 150 of the Constitution in so far as such functions relate to the opening of sub-heads and detailed heads of Accounts under various major and minor heads of Accounts pertaining to their departments w.e.f

22. State whether true or false        The Ministry of Railways, Controller General of Defence Accounts, Director General, Posts and Secretary Department of Telecommunications and Chairman Telecommunication Commission shall functions related to the opening of sub-heads and detailed heads of Accounts under various major and minor in consultation with CAG.
column7: [Rule: False. Railway- ADAI (Railway), Defence- (DADS), Post- Director of Audit (Post)]
